description: A floating restaurant ship run by Zeff and his crew of fighting cooks. Known for its excellent cuisine and its ability to defend itself from pirate attacks.

keyEvents.title: Krieg's Fleet Appears
keyEvents.description: Don Krieg's damaged flagship emerges from the fog near the Baratie, causing panic.

keyEvents.title: Don Krieg Enters
keyEvents.description: Don Krieg and Gin enter the restaurant in a weakened, starving state.

keyEvents.title: Krieg's Attack
keyEvents.description: Don Krieg betrays the Baratie and launches an assault on the restaurant.

statusHistory.description: Under siege by Don Krieg and his pirates
